channel.title: [REQ] Tutorial on BASICS of Java for dummies
channel.description:
Hey, I'm new to java, and tbh, I just need a tutorial to get to know Java, because I tend to catch on pretty quickly once I know what something is, so, a guide, tutorial whatever you want to call it, I need one.
Some key things I'm looking for:
[ul][li]Basic Java Programming Guide[/li] [li]Tips On Using Java[/li] [li]Easy-Steps On Programming A Basic Program[/li] [li]Anything that a complete dummy will need to know about Java[/li][/ul]
Thank you in advance, I really need as much help as physically possible.

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/reallybigindex.html

Start at the top, work your way to the bottom.

It’s probably the most useful site for this sort of thing.
